title: WTF RITO PLS (REMAKE BROKEN?!)
body: we queued for ranked,we had an afk adc, we remaked, i lost lp while i was playing wtf can a rioter see this?R.I.P. my lp

replies.body: Looking into this, it appears that you were marked as AFK which resulted in a loss on your account.  Even if another player is AFK, it's important to continue participating in the match.  A /remake isn't guaranteed as the other team still needs to vote for it, or the leaver could also return.  More information on /remake can also be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ).  Hope that helps!

Looking at the game in question through your match history, my guess you lost LP due to being flagged as AFK, considering you were level 1, have no CS, and have no damage dealt or taken.

There are certain behaviors that will flag you as AFK even if you don't physically disconnect from the game. Examples of this include standing or running around your base doing nothing. Anyone who is flagged as AFK when a match is remade will receive the penalty; it's not limited to only the first player that leaves. It is important to keep playing

For more information, you can read the FAQ. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ

Something important to note is that if a player leaves before any kills have happened, first blood WILL NOT prevent a remake from happening. So if a teammate leaves before first blood happens, you can safely continue playing the match without fear of first blood preventing it.
